radiographic_examinations.findings: A 4.3 x 23.0 cm necrotic mass in the right paratracheal region adjacent to a 4.2 x 23.7 cm necrotic right parahilar mass obstructing the right upper lobe bronchus. Metastases to mediastinal and right supraclavicular nodes.
Tumors in the right adrenal gland (8.0 cm), right frontal lobe (2.6 x 22.0 cm), right posterior cerebellum (2.3 x 21.7 cm), and pole of the right upper lobe of the lung (2.5 cm).
Partially necrotic mass (5.5 x 23.5 x 23.2 cm) involving the left half of the C2 vertebral body and a spiculated mass (3.2 x 22.2 cm) in the left upper lobe of lung.
1.0 cm nodule in the apex of the left upper lobe and a 5.0 x 24.0 cm mass at the fifth costosternal junction; biopsy revealed metastatic adenocarcinoma of the lung.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Complete resolution of the costosternal metastasis after chemoradiation therapy.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Large mass in the right upper lobe.

Solid heterogeneously enhancing multilobulated mass (11.2 x 210.1 x 28.5 cm) in the superior segment of the right upper lobe; metastatic disease to a subcarinal lymph node (2.5 x 21.5 cm) and probable metastatic disease to conglomerated right perihilar lymph nodes (4.8 x 23.3 cm).
